lyric: 作词 : Ruby Qu
作曲 : 王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)
编曲 Arranger : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
制作人 Producer : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
Moonlight, a barren void to horizon
translation: 月光，吞没地平的荒芜虚空

lyric: Days blur into nights of dreadful silence oh
translation: 白昼，模糊成可怖的静夜

lyric: You let me see thy heart,
Lost beacon in the dark,
Our lonely souls that spark, we break apart
translation: 我们高洁闪耀的灵魂，只得分离四散

lyric: We find, we strive, our journey of eternity
translation: 我们找寻，我们竭力，行于永不停歇的旅程

lyric: Desire, in mind, to set our spirits free
translation: 铭刻于心的渴望，须使我们的魂灵自由

lyric: Echoes fade to oblivion
Freedom to make our own
We trod our destinies on
A path unknown
With you, rejoice?
Silence falls upon thy shadows and void
translation: 寂静，降临在你的阴影虚空

lyric: Voyage through your labyrinth of misery oh~
translation: 航行，穿越你痛苦的迷宫

lyric: Then we escape afar,
To wounded souls that scar
Prisoners of the dark, til we break apart!
translation: 在黑暗中被囚困，直至我们分崩离析！

lyric: We pry, in line, through darkness where the shadows sleep
translation: 我们并肩，凿穿阴影笼罩的黑暗

lyric: Our fire, resigned, they let our souls to keep
translation: 即便心火沉沦冷却，我们的灵魂始终如炬

lyric: Gazing for flickers of light
Yearning for fate’s design
Searching for destiny of time
They’ve left behind?
In hope, in vain,
To whom, who waits?
人声 Vocal Artist：几田莉拉
伴唱 Choir : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)/王可鑫 Eli.W (HOYO-MiX)/奏SOU
录音棚 Recording Studio : prime sound studio form
录音师 Recording Engineer : Masaki Mori（agehasprings）
混音师 Mixing Engineer : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
母带制作 Mastering Engineer : 崔瀚普TSAR (HOYO-MiX)
出品 Produced by : HOYO-MiX
